title: [Western DragonSpine, Slope]
description: A soft mat of dull-colored moss covers the rock underfoot, muffling footsteps.  Dim lights out in the mist glow for a few seconds, and then fade from existence.  Odd scratching sounds come from a deep fissure, the emanations few and quick before resting.
location: between Wehnimer's Landing and Zul Logoth
